Module Simulator
Package kin.model

Class ConnectionPointModel

java.lang.Object
kin.model.ConnectionPointModel
public final class ConnectionPointModel
extends java.lang.Object

A ConnectionPoint connects a fix-side-part to a tail-side-part. The ConnectionPoint formally belongs to the fix-side part. A fix-side-part may have multiple ConnectionPoint instances (e.g. a body). The ConnectionPoint specifies the location where the tail-side-part should be attached in local coordinates of the fix-side-part. In addition, the tail-side-part can by rotated.

For the application of rotation and translation see RotoTranslation

    • ConnectionPointModel

      public ConnectionPointModel​(FixSidePartModel fixSidePartModel, double movX, double movY, double movZ, double angYZ, double angXZ, double angXY)
      Creates a ConnectionPointModel.
      Parameters:
      fixSidePartModel - this which component does this connection point belong
      movX - the translation in x-direction
      movY - the translation in y-direction
      movZ - the translation in z-direction
      angYZ - rotation angle in radians in the y-z-plane
      angXY - rotation angle in radians in the x-y-plane
      angXZ - rotation angle in radians in the x-z-plane
